articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Song and Dance Ensemble of Korean People's Internal Security Forces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys KPISF Song and Dance Ensemble Performance
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A performance of the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) was given with splendor at Ponghwa Art Theatre in Pyongyang on Thursday to celebrate the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed the performance. 
					
					 When Kim Jong Un, together with his wife Ri Sol Ju, appeared at the auditorium, stormy cheers of "Hurrah!" burst forth.
					
					 He waved back to the audience and warmly congratulated them on the war victory day. 
					
					 Appreciating the performance were Korean People's Army Vice Marshal Hyon Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA; Kim Kyong Hui, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, Department Director Kim Yong Chun and Secretary Kim Ki Nam of the WPK Central Committee, who are Politburo members of the WPK Central Committee; Secretaries Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae and Mun Kyong Dok who are alternate Politburo members of the WPK Central Committee; Ri Pyong Sam, director of the KPISF Political Department who is an alternate Politburo member of the WPK Central Committee; party and army officials and KPISF service personnel. 
					
					 The performance began with narration and music "Our Victory Day July 27".
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung," male duet and chorus "Victors," male guitar quartet ensemble "Song of Soldier," female sextet "My Dear Has Become Hero" and accordion quartet "We Will As Ever Defend Seas of the Country". 
					
					 The performers sang of the undying feats of Kim Il Sung who wrought miracles of history by defeating the most atrocious U.S. imperialists in the war. 
					
					 Oral narration "Promise," female solo "He Has Come with President's Love" and other pieces represent boundless reverence for Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, who developed the Korean People's Army into an elite army and turned the DPRK into an invincible politico-ideological and military power with his unique Songun politics in the worst adversity to glorify the July 27 victory day. 
					
					 Dialogue poem "Smile a Broad Smile" and mixed duet and chorus "For Posterity" and other numbers dealing with honor and pride of holding in high esteem Marshal Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly illustrious commander of Songun, who is bringing earlier the final victory of a thriving Korea with noble outlook on posterity and future were acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the excellent performance vibrant with the revolutionary zeal and stamina of the vanguard of the Songun revolution.
					
					 He mounted the stage to give congratulations on the successful performance, waving back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that they would share the idea, will, breath and destiny with the leader and take the lead in the defence of the leader, social system and people. He had a photo session with all the participants.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Goes Round Ryugyong Health Complex and People's Open-Air Ice Rink
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Ryugyong Health Complex, People's Open-Air Ice Rink
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) --  Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the Ryugyong Health Complex and People's Open-Air Ice Rink nearing the completion. 
					 He went to the Ryugyong Health Complex first. 
					
					 Examining the exterior of the health complex, he said that recently appearing buildings including the complex are diverse and peculiar in shape. 
					
					 At the nice and clean hall he said it seemed that he was briefed on the project in front of the panoramic map a few days ago, but the complex has changed beyond recognition. 
					
					 Walking along the corridor he said the wall decorated with stone pieces was good just as he said before. The contents of the structure hinge on the building materials used at the final phase of the construction, he added. 
					
					 He personally opened a dressing box of mass bathroom and dropped in at hot dry, wet and pine tree saunas to learn in detail about the construction. It is important to take thorough-going measure for disinfection of bathrooms including saunas and sanitation is most important, he said. 
					
					 Going around a barber's, massage room, family bathroom and other places, he corrected shortcomings one by one. He underscored the need to give finishing touches with an idea that there is no satisfaction in working for the people. 
					
					 At the popular restaurant on the fourth floor he learned about the service program there. He said that people want to drink refreshing drinks after bathing. It will be good to serve soft drinks, noodle and other foods, he said, adding that the Ryugyong Health Complex should be well known to the people for its tasty noodle. 
					
					 He then went to the People's Open-Air Ice Rink.
					
					 He went round various places of the ice rink including skating hall, skate service room, lounges for players, clinic, broadcasting room and observation room to learn in detail about the construction.
					
					 On the spacious icy ground he was satisfied to see people skating, saying that it is nice to see people skating even in the hottest period of summer.
					
					 He said the architectural style and content are fresh and peculiar and everything of the ice rink ranging from its design to construction is on a high level.  He set forth the tasks for completion of the construction.
					
					 Looking at the space in front the ice rink, he said that the ice rink would be perfect in all aspects as a multi-functional skating ground if a roller-skating ground was added to it.
					
					 He said as the Ryugyong Health Complex and People's Open-Air Ice Rink were presents of the Workers' Party to the people it is important to keep the content ahead of the style. He stressed the need not to care for bringing earlier the day of the completion but make the projects impeccable in a more responsible manner. 
					
					　He was accompanied by Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, and Ryang Chong Song, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Congratulations from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Syrian President Bashar Al－Assad on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to Your Excellency on your holding of the title of Marshal on July 17, 2012 and wish you great success in your responsible work.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I would like to express my deep thanks to Your Excellency, the leadership of the DPRK and the friendly Korean people for having rendered support and encouragement to our just cause against the moves of the world powers to interfere in our internal affairs.

articles.title: Congratulations from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on July 20.
					 The message said: 
					
					 I, on behalf of all the members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf, extend warmest congratulations to Comrade Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK NDC and supreme commander of the KPA, upon your holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					
					 Awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to you this time is an expression of the absolute faith and will of all the members of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to triumphantly advance the revolutionary cause of Juche and the Songun revolutionary cause under the wise leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish you good health and hope that you would wisely lead the heroic struggle of the Korean people to further glorify Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: Congratulations from Military Attaches Corps on War Victory Day
articles.content:
Congratulations from Military Attaches Corps on War Victory Day 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by the head of the corps Hassan Reza Husseini who is military attache of the Iranian embassy on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulations from Japanese Organization on War Victory Day
articles.content:
Congratulations from Japanese Organization on War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Tokushima Prefectural Citizens' Forum for Japan-Korea Friendship sent a floral basket to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on Thursday, a day before the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Condolences to Ghanaian President
articles.content:
Condolences to Ghanaian President 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of condolences to Ghanaian President John Dramani Mahama. 
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam, upon receiving the sad news that Ghanaian President John Evans Atta Mills died of an illness regretfully, expressed deep condolences to the president and, through him, to the government and people of Ghana and the bereaved families. 
					
					 He hoped that the friendly government and people of Ghana would overcome the sorrow and achieve prosperity and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Liberian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Communist Party Officials
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from National Chairman Renato Ravello and International Secretary Ricardo Alemao Abreu of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party on July 20.
					 The message said:
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party extends warm congratulations to you on your earning of the title of DPRK Marshal, wishing you great success in your duty for advancing socialism of the DPRK and promoting the overall well-being of the workers and other people of your country.
					
					 We are watching with great concern and good wishes socialist construction and, in particular, the struggle of the WPK for achieving fresh goals it set forth for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The Korean people will accomplish the great historical task under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 With this message on the great event, we reaffirm our will to strengthen friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK and promote closer ties between the two peoples and countries.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kuwaiti PM and FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kuwaiti PM and FM
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Jaber Al Mubarak Al Hamad Al Sabah upon his reappointment as prime minister of Kuwait.
					 The message wished the prime minister bigger success in his work for prosperity of the country and people's welfare.
					
					 On that day DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Sabah Al Khalid Al Hamad Al Sabah upon his reappointment as deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Kuwait.

articles.title: Greetings from Brazilian Communist Party Officials
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Communist Party Officials
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from National Chairman Renato Ravello and International Secretary Ricardo Alemao Abreu of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party on July 20.
					 The message said:
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party extends warm congratulations to you on your earning of the title of DPRK Marshal, wishing you great success in your duty for advancing socialism of the DPRK and promoting the overall well-being of the workers and other people of your country.
					
					 We are watching with great concern and good wishes socialist construction and, in particular, the struggle of the WPK for achieving fresh goals it set forth for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The Korean people will accomplish the great historical task under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 With this message on the great event, we reaffirm our will to strengthen friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK and promote closer ties between the two peoples and countries.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Lao Delegation and UNICEF Representative
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Lao Delegation and UNICEF Representative
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with a Lao government economic delegation headed by Siaosavath Savengsuksa, vice-minister of Industry and Commerce, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 On that day Pak met and had a talk with Bijaya Rajbhandari, representative of the Office of UNICEF here, who paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: War Veterans across DPRK Arrive in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegates of War Veterans across DPRK Arrive in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Delegates of war veterans arrived here Thursday to take part in the celebrations to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, being blessed by the people across the country.
					 Airports, railway stations and parking lots were crowded with delegates to the celebrations, their comrades-in-arms, families and relatives, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 People warmly saw off the delegates with feelings of gratitude to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who made sure that respect for the revolutionary forerunners pervaded the country celebrating the war victory day.
					
					 Pyongyang was wrapped in a festive mood to greet the participants in the great Fatherland Liberation War who are here thanks to deep loving care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They, in military uniforms with decorations on their chests, arrived here by planes, trains and buses from across the country. They were greeted by people from all walks of life in the city.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Lodgings of Delegates to War Victory Day Celebrations
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Lodgings of Delegates to War Victory Day Celebrations
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Pak To Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Jo Yon Jun and other officials of the party and armed forces bodies, working people's organizations and the Cabinet Thursday visited the lodgings of delegates to the celebrations of the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They warmly welcomed the war veteran delegates who came to Pyongyang being granted privileges thanks to the direct initiative and great benevolence by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They requested the veterans to cherish the profound loving care shown by Kim Jong Un, who regards them as very precious, and remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea in the same heroic fighting spirit and stamina as were displayed by them in the flames of war.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Vow to Remain Loyal to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Vow to Remain Loyal to Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting of service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Thursday, a day before the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were Director of the KPA General Political Bureau Choe Ryong Hae, Chief of the KPA General Staff Hyon Yong Chol, Minister of the People's Armed Forces Kim Jong Gak, its First Vice Minister Hyon Chol Hae and its leading officials and servicepersons.
					
					 Hyon Yong Chol made a speech. Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was attributable to the original military idea and outstanding strategy and tactics of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and the indomitable fighting spirit of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il developed the KPA into a matchless army and provided a firm guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, they noted.
					
					 The revolutionary exploits performed by the great Generalissimos are shedding brighter rays thanks to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly brilliant commander, they said.
					
					 They called upon the servicepersons to become human bombs and bullets to defend the WPK Central Committee headed by the great Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 They said they would frustrate the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Lecturers of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and members of KPA art squads sang "To the Road of Decisive Battle," a song which KPA soldiers used to sing in the frontline during the war.
					
					 Servicepersons expressed the will to adhere to their revolutionary nature as they are grown to be army of the leader and the party under the warm care of the Generalissimos.
					
					 Then there was a dancing party of service personnel.

articles.title: War Veterans Display Patriotism
articles.content:
War Veterans Display Patriotism
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- War veterans in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have invariably displayed the patriotic spirit as they did during the last Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) and in the postwar period.
					 They are taking the lead in the effort to spruce up the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, historic sites and revolutionary battle sites across the country.  And they introduce heroic exploits of the Korean People's Army in the war to young people to encourage them in devotedly defending the leader and the country.
					
					  The veterans also voluntarily find work needed to be done for the building of a prosperous and powerful country in response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government, without care for any reward or honor. Typical of such good deeds is an activity of war veterans' itinerant art squad, which is getting brisk with each passing day. This activity greatly encourages people to perform great feats in production and construction.
					
					 Many war veterans are now arriving in Pyongyang to attend the celebrations of the war victory day (July 27) being held under the deep care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegation of Russian Railways Company Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Russian Railways Company Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Railways Company led by Valery Reshetnikov, senior vice president of the company, left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Pyongyang Machinery Exhibition to Be Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Machinery Exhibition to Be Held
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The 2012 Pyongyang Machinery Exhibition will be held at the Three Revolution Exhibition on August 6-9.
					 Attending it will be nearly 60 companies from the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, China, Germany, Singapore, Italy, the Czech Republic and Taipei of China.
					
					 To be exhibited are machine tools and machinery and equipment used in vessel, mining, building-material and packing. Business consultations on contract, joint venture and collaboration will take place on the sidelines of the exhibition.
					
					 The exhibition, sponsored by the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, will be helpful to strengthening cooperation and exchange among countries and regions.

articles.title: DPRK Female Footballers Down Colombian Rivals 2:0
articles.content:
DPRK Female Footballers Down Colombian Rivals 2:0
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The female soccer group league matches of the London Olympics were kicked off.
					 A match was played in Glasgow on Wednesday between the DPRK and Colombian teams in group C, which resulted in Koreans' 2:0 win.
					
					 Koreans are to have a next match with French rivals on July 29.

articles.title: Commuter Buses for Music Prodigies Run in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Commuter Buses for Music Prodigies Run in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Mini-buses, marked with "Kyongsang Kindergarten", attract Pyongyang citizens' eyes in streets.
					 They are given priority on the roads, along with vans carrying bean milk for children.
					
					 The Kyongsang Kindergarten trains little music prodigies.
					
					 Kim Sun Nyo, a teacher at the Kyongsang Kindergarten, told KCNA:
					
					  "Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime sent the buses to the kindergarten for the commuting of children getting early musical education.
					
					 Before the provision of the commuter buses, children at the kindergarten had to use bus route or metro under the care of their parents.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Jong Il was the tender-hearted father of children as he put forward them as the king of the country and had taken warm care of them as their own parents would do."
					
					 Kim Nam Hui, mother of a kindergartener, said:
					
					 "We, parents, are very thankful to the leader and the socialist system for having cultivated our children's talents and provided such commuter buses. The children of our country are the happiest in the world."
					
					 A driver, Ri Yong Nam, said that he feels pride and honor of serving the children, the king of the country.

articles.title: Story about 206 Varieties of Daily Necessities
articles.content:
Story about 206 Varieties of Daily Necessities
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of 206 varieties of daily necessities took place at the Pyongyang Railway Station Department Store on July 23-26.
					 Those varieties were personally chosen by President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime for the betterment of local people's living.
					
					 It was in July Juche 65 (1976) that an enlarged meeting of the Political Commission of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea discussed issues concerning light industry.
					
					 In the second-day meeting, the President suggested discussing the issue of daily necessities and acquainted himself in detail with varieties of the goods on sale in cities, workers' districts and rural communities.
					
					 Then he learnt about how many kinds of sundry goods were produced at central and local factories and instructed the then Public Service Commission to work out a list of daily necessities ordered.
					
					 The new list covered 193 varieties of goods. Not satisfied with the list, he called several people with different jobs to hear about their demands for goods. Then he added 13 kinds to the list of goods in consideration of their demands.
					
					 After all, the daily necessities increased to 206 in the number of their varieties.

articles.title: Masterminds of Terrorism Bound to Face Punishment by History
articles.content:
Masterminds of Terrorism Bound to Face Punishment by History
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the United States and south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime let human dregs form a "statue demolition society" in a bid to undermine the socialist system in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 The emergence of this "society", whose mission is to demolish statues of the DPRK leaders, shows how far the hostile forces have gone to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 In fact, the reactionary ruling circles of the U.S. employed every conceivable means to block the progress of the DPRK, including political and military pressure and economic sanctions. They also conducted operations to cause social unrest in the country.
					
					 But the DPRK army and people are advancing toward their final victory, rallied closer around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Upset at their advance, the U.S. is making last-ditch efforts by prodding the Lee group of traitors and even defectors from the north of Korea to the south to destroy statues and monuments in the DPRK.
					
					 The recently disclosed terrorist case aimed at demolition of statue fully revealed the true colors of the U.S., which had asserted it has no intention to antagonize the DPRK. This also clearly showed that traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group of conservatives in south Korea are the source of confrontation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Lee group has gone the lengths of attempting state-sponsored terrorism with daydream for "change" in the DPRK, a hideous crime that the successive military fascists of south Korea dared not commit.
					
					 However, such sinister plots will only harden the single-minded unity between the leader and people in the DPRK and fan up their hatred toward the anti-DPRK forces.
					
					 The U.S., mastermind of terrorism, and the confrontation fanatics of south Korea are bound to face a stern punishment by history for their crimes.

articles.title: Evidence Exposing U.S. Imperialists and Class Enemies' Aggressive Nature and Brutal Atrocities Unearthed
articles.content:
Evidence Exposing U.S. Imperialists and Class Enemies' Aggressive Nature and Brutal Atrocities Unearthed
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Historical evidence exposing the aggressive nature and brutal atrocities of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies were unearthed in different parts of South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 Two bombs weighing 500 kg were discovered in Tanchon City in May and July and dozens of bullets, fuses, etc. in various districts of Hamhung City.
					
					 Despite passage of time, explosives charged with powder were in dangerous condition that may go off any moment though they got rusty. 
					
					 Dozens of materials of five kinds were newly displayed at the South Hamgyong Provincial House of Class Education this year.
					
					 Among them are a 150 kg dud bomb that was dug out of area around railroad of Hungnam Railway Station and a 50 kg time bomb that was planted in the bank of the River Songchon.
					
					 There are also materials proving atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists and class enemies who sexually assaulted women in Joyang-ri, Hamju County before torturing and killing them as well as evidence proving that they killed hundreds of innocent people on a bridge between Yodok and Kumya counties.

articles.title: Cuban Figure Reiterates Support for Korean People's Efforts for National Reunification
articles.content:
Cuban Figure Reiterates Support for Korean People's Efforts for National Reunification 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, expressed solidarity with the efforts of the Korean people for national reunification in his speech at the closing ceremony of the month of solidarity with the Korean people in Havana on July 18. 
					 He said that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the DPRK with huge armed forces on June 25, 1950. However, they could not but kneel down to the heroic Korean people possessed of indomitable mental power and strong fighting spirit. 
					
					 The victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War was a precious fruition of the brilliant military idea, strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, he said, and went on:
					
					 Korea still remains separated into two parts and a lot of U.S. troops are present in south Korea and nuclear weapons are deployed there targeting the DPRK.
					
					The President and leader Kim Jong ll are great men who devoted all their life to the effort for national reunification. 
					
					 Korea's reunification will come earlier as it is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is implementing their idea and line. 
					
					 We will as ever make every possible effort for the unbreakable friendship and solidarity between Cuba and the DPRK and always extend full support to the struggle of the Korean people for national reunification.

articles.title: Greek President Voices Intention to Boost Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Greek President Voices Intention to Boost Relations with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- President of Greece Carlos Papoulias hoped that everything will go well in the DPRK. He said this when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to Greece Kim Chun Guk on July 19. 
					 He said that it is the consistent stand of the government of Greece to boost the friendly relations with the DPRK. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would steadily develop in various fields. 
					
					 Greece and the DPRK are located in different places of this planet but they will further strengthen friendship and solidarity by their joint efforts, he added.

articles.title: War Veterans Grateful to Kim Jong Un for Celebrations of War Victory Day
articles.content:
War Veterans Grateful to Kim Jong Un for Celebrations of War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- War veterans arrived in the capital city of Pyongyang on Thursday by air, train and bus from across the country to attend the celebrations of the war victory day (July 27). 
					 The celebrations were initiated by Marshal Kim Jong Un, who took every possible measure for war veterans' participation in the celebrations without inconvenience. 
					
					 A war veteran, Kim Yong Hwan (80), told KCNA:
					
					 "I came to Pyongyang aboard a plane sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Now I am eager to express my gratitude to him, supreme commander."
					
					 Another war veteran, Kim Sung Hyon (81), said:
					
					 "It was quite natural for me to join the army in my youth time to defend the country from the invasion of the enemy. But the Party and the government have always put forward me as a war veteran, giving me preferential treatment.
					
					 I came here by a special train. We, war veterans, enjoy good luck under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un, gifted brilliant commander who is identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, thank you very much."

articles.title: S. Koreans Launch Signature Campaign against Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
S. Koreans Launch Signature Campaign against Military Agreement with Japan 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A pan-national signature campaign for checking the conclusion of a military agreement with Japan was kicked off in Seoul on July 24.
					 Organizing the campaign is the committee for checking the south Korea-Japan military agreement, implementing the south-north joint declaration and promoting pan-national rally for peace and reunification to mark the 67th anniversary of the country's liberation. 
					
					 The committee groups civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Federation of the Poor and the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century as well as youth and student organizations.
					
					 Earlier, the organization held a press conference.
					
					 Speakers said that the Lee Myung Bak "government" is watching for a chance to conclude military agreement with Japan which it had pushed forward in secrecy. It was forced to suspend it in face of public protest.
					
					 The group of "Saenuri Party" asserted that the conclusion of the agreement has problems concerning procedure and course only, while siding with the present "government", they noted.
					
					 It is common understanding of members of civic and social organizations that the struggle against the military agreement has not ended, they added. 
					
					 They called upon all the people to turn out in the pan-national signature campaign to curb the conclusion of treacherous agreement in order to eradicate the pro-Japanese elements in their desperate efforts and to achieve independence, peace and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Italian Figure 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Sergio Cararo, chief of the Information Department of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, made public a statement on July 5 to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 In the statement he said that Kim Il Sung was the great father of the people who devoted all his life to their happiness. 
					
					 The President, who regarded it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, protected their interests and put them forward as the masters of the country while sharing destiny with them, he said, and went on:
					
					 The President wisely led the socialist cause of the DPRK and turned it into a socialist power with independent politics, self-supporting economy and self-reliant national defence capabilities. The Korean people highly praise him as the "great father of the people" and the "eternal President of the DPRK".
					
					 Now the Korean people are stepping up the building of a thriving socialist nation, closely united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his famous work to mark the centenary of the birth of the President "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" stressed the need to successfully accomplish his revolutionary cause. 
					
					 We will widely introduce the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and extend full support to the efforts of the Korean people advancing under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Holding of Title of DPRK Marshal Hailed by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Holding of Title of DPRK Marshal Hailed by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A Russian delegation and Bulgarian figures visited the DPRK missions in their countries on July 20 to congratulate the awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to the dear respected Kim Jong Un. They are a delegation of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union and personages of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia and the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea. 
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said the world progressives see the victory of socialism and the future of prospering Juche Korea in the great image of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un's holding of the title of DPRK Marshal is an auspicious event not only for the Korean people but also for the Russian people loving justice, he said, expressing the will to widely organize colorful political and cultural events to congratulate the significant event. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said that awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is an expression of absolute and boundless trust of the Korean people in him and their firm will to build a thriving socialist nation at any cost true to his leadership. 
					
					 Despite grave obstructions of forces unpleased with socialist Korea, the just cause of the Korean people will surely emerge victorious as long as they have the leadership of Kim Jong Un, single-minded unity of the whole society with him as a core, as well as strong nuclear deterrence, he added.

articles.title: Congratulatory Statement for Kim Jong Un Issued by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Congratulatory Statement for Kim Jong Un Issued by Italian Figure
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, on July 21 made public a statement titled "Warm congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un" upon his holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 He extended warm congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un in the name of all the party members of the movement, the statement said.
					
					 Awarding Kim Jong Un the title of Marshal represented the firm will of all the Korean people to be loyal to him for all ages, it stressed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un carried forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and rendered distinguished services to demonstrate the DPRK as a military power that no formidable enemy dares provoke, it stressed.
					
					 It expressed firm conviction that the Korean people would register further success in the construction of a thriving socialist country with firm confidence in victory of revolution and optimism about the future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The movement would actively support the Korean people's efforts for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the future, too, it added.
					
					 Bangladeshi figures also published statements on July 20 and 21.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League and chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, said it is a great event ensuring the prospects of Songun Korea and everlasting prosperity of the nation. It is also the greatest fortune and honor to the Workers' Party, army and people of Korea, he added.
					
					    M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, said it is a historical event of great significance in ushering in a new heyday for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea. He was firmly convinced that the army and people of the DPRK would strive for the bright future of Songun Korea with this great pride and honor.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Lauded 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator (leader) of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, met with An Kun Song, DPRK ambassador to Mexico, on July 18.
					 At the meeting the coordinator paid the highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung on the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The President made immortal contributions to Korea's reunification by setting forth fair and aboveboard proposals for reunification including the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, he said, and went on:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated those proposals as the three charters for national reunification, thus performing great feats for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Mexico sent firm support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people striving to build an economic power and improve the people's livelihood while steadily increasing the defence capability including nuclear deterrent to cope with the threat of war and economic sanctions by the U.S. 
					
					 The coordinator heartily wished the WPK and the Korean people great success in their efforts to build a thriving socialist country and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of First Secretary Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del conjunto artistico de ESIPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del conjunto artistico de ESIPC
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal  Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea  presencio el dia 26 en el capitalino Teatro de Arte Ponghwa la funcion del conjunto artistico del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea dedicada al 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Cuando el Mariscal Kim Jong Un aparecio en la graderia junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju todos los participantes les exclamaban con estruendosos vitores.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo les envio el cordial saludo y la calida felicitacion.
					
					 Le acompanaron en verla el vicemariscal del EPC Hyon Yong Chol, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, y Kim Kyong Hui, secretaria del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, vicepresidente del CDN, Kim Yong Chun, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC, quienes son miembros del Buro Politico del CC del PTC; Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae y Mun Kyong Dok, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC; Ri Pyong Sam, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y jefe del departamento politico del ESIPC, los funcionarios del partido y el ejercito y los oficiales y soldados del ESIPC.
					
					 Se inicio la funcion  de narracion y la cancion "27 de julio, dia de la victoria".
					
					 En la escena se pusieron el coro "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!", el duo masculino y coro "Triunfadores", el cuarteto masculino acompanado con guitarra "Cancion del combatiente" y otras variadas piezas.
					
					  Los ejecutantes elogiaron calurosamente las inmortales proezas de victoria en la guerra del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung quien creo el milagro historico con que vencio a los imperialistas norteamericanos mas salvajes en el mundo.
					
					    La narracion oral "Promesa", el solo femenino "Vino con el amor del Presidente" y otras piezas demostraron la infinita veneracion al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien con su original politica de Songun intensifico el EPC como destacamento de flora y nata, convirtio la patria en la potencia politica y ideologica y en la potencia militar de talla mundial, para ostentar a todo el mundo el victorioso dia 27 de julio.
					
					 El poema en dialogo "Rianse claramente" y el duo mixto y coro "Por las generaciones venideras" demuestran la infinita gloria y dignidad de enaltecer al genial comandante del Songun Mariscal Kim Jog Un quien con el noble concepcion de generacion venidera y el porvenir anticipa la victoria final de la Corea prospera, por tanto recibieron los aplausos de los espectadores.
					
					 Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del conjunto hayan ofrecido la funcion magnifica inspirada por el entusiasmo revolucionario y el impetu combativo de los combatientes de la vanguardia revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					 El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien subio a la escena, felicito el exito de la funcion saludando a las exclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					 El expreso la expectativa y la conviccion de que todos los militares del ESIPC defenderan firmemente el puesto avanzado por la defensa al lider, el regimen y el pueblo compartiendo junto con el Dirigente la idea, el proposito y el destino, y se fotografio junto con los participantes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre establecimientos de servicio publico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre establecimientos de servicio publico
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal  Kim Jong Un, Primer  Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite  de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y  Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recorrio el Complejo de 
					 Servicios de Higiene Ryugyongwon y el Patinadero al Aire Libre del Pueblo  en las etapas de culminacion.
					
					 El estuvo primero en el Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Ryugyongwon.
					
					 Al ver el exterior del complejo senalo que son diversos y especificos  los tipos de los edificios levantados recientemente como este.
					
					 En el hall acondicionado limpiamente se mostro alegre diciendo que se ha  cambiado mucho mas que antes cuando escuchaba la explicacion ante el  plano.
					
					 En el pasillo dijo que se cambia el contenido del edificio segun el uso  de materiales finales de construccion.
					
					 El Mariscal abrio en personal la caja de la cabina y recorrio la sauna  en seco, humedad y de pino, atendiendo el proceso detallado de la obra,  cuando subrayo que es muy importante tomar las medidas de desinfectacion  en el bano incluyendo la sauna.
					
					 Dando vueltas por la sala de pelado, la de masaje, el bano para familia  y otros hizo resolver uno tras otro los problemas presentados, senalo que  es necesario hacer el trabajo de retoque hasta el dia de culminacion con  la conciencia de que no hay el satisfecho en la labor para el pueblo.
					
					 Se entero del plan de servicio en el comedor publico en cuarto piso y  dijo que seria mejor servir los platos como refrescos y fideos porque las  personas buscaran lo fresco despues de terminar el bano.
					
					 Y destaco que el complejo debe elaborar mejor el fideo para atraer a las  personas.
					
					 Acto seguido, estuvo en el Patinadero al Aire Libre del Pueblo.
					
					 Al recorrer varios puntos del patinadero tales como el hall, el puesto  de prestacion de patines, la sala de espera y descanso de los jugadores,  la de servicio medico, radiodifusion, observacion se cercioro en detalles  del estado de la obra.
					
					 En la cancha de hielo mirando con la cara sonriente a los trabajadores  que patinan, se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que es raro y elegante ver  a las personas que patinan tambien en la estacion canicular.
					
					 Enseno que son nuevos y tipicos la forma y el contenido de la  arquitectura del patinadero y fue construido en el alto nivel desde el  diseno hasta la obra y presento las tareas para terminar la construccion.
					
					 Al ver el terreno desocupado frente al patinadero senalo que si se  construye en este lugar la cancha de patin de ruedas el patinadero  dispondra completamente de su aspecto como lugar multifuncional.
					
					 El complejo y el patinadero son regalos para el pueblo preparados por el  partido, razon por la cual hay que acondicionarlos perfectamente sin  apurar la inauguracion elevando mas la exigencia, indico y agrego que el  contenido es mas importante que la forma.
					
					 Le acompanaron en la ocasion Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico y  secretaria, del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro del BP del CC del PTC  y vicepresidente del CDN y Ryang Chong Song, ubjefe de departamento del  CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente siriaco
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente siriaco
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 24 el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					 El mensaje subraya como sigue:
					
					 En relacion con el otorgamiento del dia 17 de julio de 2012 del titulo del mariscal envio a Su Excelencia mi sincera felicitacion  y le deseo grandes exitos en sus labores responsables.
					
					 Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar profundo agradecimiento a Su Excelencia, a la direccion de la RPDC y el amistoso pueblo coreano que envian apoyo y respaldo a la justa causa de nosotros que estamos luchando contra las maniobras de la intervencion en los asuntos internos de las potencias mundiales.

articles.title: Cuadros coreanos visitan residencia de veteranos delegados
articles.content:
Cuadros coreanos visitan residencia de veteranos delegados
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- Pak To Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Jo Yon Jun y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas, organizaciones de masas y del Consejo de Ministros visitaron el dia 26 el alojamiento de los delegados de veteranos de la guerra a los festejos del 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Ellos felicitaron calurosamente a los veteranos de guerra que vinieron a Pyongyang para participar en esos actos programados por la iniciativa personal del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Encomendaron a los delegados que tengan siempre presente el gran amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien considera a los veteranos como entes mas valiosos que los montones de oro y apoyen fielmente la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun con el espiritu y el modo de lucha heroica con que combatieron en los severos dias de guerra.

articles.title: Veteranos de guerra coreana se esfuerzan por prosperidad de Corea
articles.content:
Veteranos de guerra coreana se esfuerzan por prosperidad de Corea
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- A pesar de sus edades avanzadas, los veteranos de la guerra coreana (1950-1953) dedican todo lo suyo en el camino de patriotismo con la decision de vivir como soldados en aquellos dias de guerra.
					 Toman delantera en acondicionar mejor el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan, los lugares de interes historico y de combate revolucionario.
					
					 Y en varias ocasiones como las tribunas y encuentros, cuentan sobre el combate heroico de los soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea  desplegado en la pasada guerra e infunden a las nuevas generaciones el ferreo espiritu de defender a ultranza al lider y la patria.
					
					 Al considerar como nueva orden de combate dada por la patria el llamamiento del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica en materia de la construccion de un Estado prospero, buscan por si solo los trabajos sin desear ninguna fama ni la  remuneracion.
					
					 Las actividades de propaganda artistica movil de los veteranos, que defendieron la patria con sangre y derramaron el sudor del patriotismo  en la posguerra para la prosperidad del pais, estimulan mucho a las personas a realizar nuevos meritos.
					
					 En la actualidad, los delegados de veteranos de guerra de todo el pais llegan a Pyongyang para participar en el acto festivo por el dia de victoria en la guerra coreana (27 de julio).
					
					 Los coreanos estan muy emocionados experimentando el amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, dispensado a los veteranos de guerra.
